instance:

0 1 1..2 boolean MCS_Processor1 boolean MCS_Processor2 0 1 1..4 boolean MCS_Processor1_Memory1 boolean MCS_Processor1_Memory2 boolean MCS_Processor2_Memory1 boolean MCS_Processor2_Memory2 0..32 0 1
<intension id= "c0""> eq(MCS, 1)
eq(Processor_card, MCS_Processor1 + MCS_Processor2 )
lq(1, MCS_Processor1 + MCS_Processor2 )
gq(2, MCS_Processor1 + MCS_Processor2 )
iff(Processor, Processor_card >0)
